references.paper_title: Imagen Video: High Definition Video Generation with Diffusion Models
references.reason: This paper introduces a foundational model for high-definition video generation using diffusion models, which is directly leveraged by the current work.

references.paper_title: FIFO-Diffusion: Generating Infinite Videos from Text without Training
references.reason: This paper proposes the first-in-first-out (FIFO) video diffusion method which is the baseline for the Ouroboros-Diffusion method in this paper.

references.paper_title: FreeNoise: Tuning-Free Longer Video Diffusion via Noise Rescheduling
references.reason: This paper introduces a tuning-free long video diffusion method that is compared against in this paper and serves as a direct comparison for the Ouroboros-Diffusion method.

references.paper_title: VideoCrafter1: Open Diffusion Models for High-Quality Video Generation
references.reason: This paper provides the pre-trained text-to-video model used as the backbone for the Ouroboros-Diffusion method.

references.paper_title: VBench: Comprehensive Benchmark Suite for Video Generative Models
references.reason: This paper introduces the benchmark dataset used to evaluate the performance of the proposed Ouroboros-Diffusion model.
